triggers.expression: javascript@runtime:function () {   var email = context.causeEvent.data['recipient'];   var currentProgramLabel = context.causeEvent.data['labels'];   var friend = context.getGlobalServices().personService.lookupPerson().withEmail(email).lookup();   var friendSteps;   if (friend) {       friendSteps = friend.getSteps();   } else {       return false;   }   for (var i = 0; i < friendSteps.length; i++) {       if (friendSteps[i].stepName === 'outcome' && friendSteps[i].programLabel === currentProgramLabel) {           context.log('Friend has already reached the outcome step in the program, not moving forward with the scheduled reminder email');           return false;       }   } return true; }();
